info.name: Google miminal
info.description:
This style makes google.com a way more simpler.
You must try this one.
info.additionalInfo:
v. 1.0.3

- Fix white font in google maps

v. 1.0.2

- Settings is now visible in the footer
- Style now applies to all Google domains

v. 1.0.1

- Background around google voice icon fixed

v. 1.0.0

- Gmail Images Notifications & all apps opacity
- Search Bar simplify
- Hide unnecessary items
- Background change
